replies.msg:
This is Zoey. For convenience, Zoey eventually took the Mark of the Beast, 666. Now Zoey can buy and sell. Zoey's friend refused the eventual Mark of the Beast and her friend's head was cut off (Revelation 13). Zoey took the eventual Mark of the Beast and Zoey will be tormented in the Lake of Fire forever (Revelation 14). Zoey's friend was resurrected and lived forever (Revelation 20:4).

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xH_SVNVIfzk
